Data Fields
CLI_Cfg_t Struct Reference
CLI Utility » CLI Utility External Data Structures

CLI configuration. More...

#include <utils/cli/cli.h>

Data Fields

char * cliPrompt
 CLI Prompt string (if any to be displayed)
 
char * cliBanner
 Optional banner string if any to be displayed on startup of the CLI.
 
UART_Handle cliUartHandle
 UART Command Handle used by the CLI.
 
uint8_t enableMMWaveExtension
 The CLI has an mmWave extension which can be enabled by this field. The extension supports the well define mmWave link CLI command(s) In order to use the extension the application should have initialized and setup the mmWave.
 
SOC_Handle socHandle
 The SOC driver handle is used to acquire device part number.
 
MMWave_Handle mmWaveHandle
 The mmWave control handle which needs to be specified if the mmWave extensions are being used. The CLI Utility works only in the FULL configuration mode. If the handle is opened in MINIMAL configuration mode the CLI mmWave extension will fail.
 
uint8_t taskPriority
 Task Priority: The CLI executes in the context of a task which executes with this priority.
 
bool usePolledMode
 Flag which determines if the the CLI Write should use the UART in polled or blocking mode.
 
CLI_CmdTableEntry tableEntry [CLI_MAX_CMD]
 This is the table which specifies the supported CLI commands.
 

Detailed Description

CLI configuration.

This is the configuration structure which is used to initialize and open the CLI module.
